trends: There have been no other sightings in Deersville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am located in a small rural town in Ohio. I have continued over the course of the last month to see unusual objects that I have some pictures and videos of. I am hoping that by posting my story, someone would take enough interest and come investigate, considering these objects keep coming back. I do not know if they are bona-fide UFO's, however, they seem quite unusual.
